name: Leps jumper - the leprechauns challenge
description:
The leprechauns are well known for being sneaky and always packing gold right?
Well do you know how they collect their gold then?
This is the game about the Leps Jumpers who skip from each mountain to another and gather gold stars to unlock the other leps.
Collect gold all day long by simply play the Leps Jumper and with one touch to stop the jump to make them land on the other mountain to collect the golden star.

But do not fall down,
Play hundreds of levels hunting down all those golden stars!
